column1: '''The Cat and the Fiddle: A Nursery Rhyme Undone and its Scandalous Secret Unlocked''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and published in [[October]]/[[November]] [[1923]] within ''[[Yorkshire Poetry]]'' Vol. 2 No. 19. It was reprinted in ''[[The Return of the Shadow]]'',<ref>{{RS
column2: 1VIIIS2}} (pp. 145-7)</ref> and as [[The Man in the Moon Stayed Up Too Late]] in ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]''.
